install.name: Webnoo_Follow_US
install.author: Shekhar Sagar Srivastava
install.description: Webnoo_Follow_US is a Joomla 1.5 module created by Webnoo Services. It Has Built in Google Pulsone Feature With Various Size Selection and also Lets your visitors to Follow you on Your Social Networking Site Like Facebook, Twitter, Digg, Orkut, Myspace etc.. with a single click.
